About Beast Packaging

 
 
 

The Beast package contains the following directories:

directory description
bin Contains pre-compiled exectuables for all Beast tools, including eRnsT, and a pre-built Maya plug-in.
distribeast Contains the installer for Distribeast controller nodes and processing nodes. See also Using Distribeast.
doc Contains this documentation.
examples and examples-physical Contains sample code projects that demonstrate the use of the Beast API in various contexts. See also Getting Started with the Beast Examples.
include Contains the header files for the Beast API.
lib Contains Beast libraries pre-compiled for 32-bit and 64-bit Windows.
maya Contains the source code and solution for the Maya plug-in.
shaders Contains sample OSL shaders for use setting up physical materials.
Please send us your comment about this page
